Interface AfterAdvice

All Superinterfaces:
Advice
All Known Subinterfaces:
AfterReturningAdvice, ThrowsAdvice
All Known Implementing Classes:
AfterReturningAdviceInterceptor, AspectJAfterAdvice, AspectJAfterReturningAdvice, AspectJAfterThrowingAdvice, ThrowsAdviceInterceptor
public interface AfterAdvice extends Advice
Common marker interface for after advice, such as AfterReturningAdvice and ThrowsAdvice.
Since:
2.0.3
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
